products.title: What an Eikel(oaknut)
products.description: As an insult the most literal English translation for eikel would be 'dickhead, The word acorn (earlier akerne, and acharn) is related to the Gothic name akran, which had the sense of "fruit of the unenclosed land".

products.title: Rounded beauty
products.description: Apples have religious and mythological significance in many cultures

products.title: Morning has broken
products.description: A grape is a fruit, botanically a berry, of the deciduous woody vines of the flowering plant genus Vitis

products.title: The forbidden taste
products.description: The blackberry is an edible fruit produced by many species in the genus Rubus in the family Rosaceae, hybrids among these species within the subgenus Rubus, and hybrids between the subgenera Rubus and Idaeobatus

products.title: Greene the grapes
products.description: The main antioxidant subtance in green grape is known as resveratrol. Green grapes contains more antioxidants and chlorophyll more that other variants of grape

products.title: Grandma is coming!!
products.description: A lovely book that has a clock built in, enabling children to learn to tell the time whilst reading
